div.p: Code indicating whether or not a provider is participating (accepting assignment) for this line item service on the non-institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/prtcptngindcd
This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-prtcptng-ind-cd defines the following codes:

tr.td: All or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Participating
All or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Participating
Assignment accepted but all or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Non-participating.
Assignment accepted but all or some covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible Non-participating.
Assignment not accepted and all covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible non- participating.
Assignment not accepted and all covered and allowed expenses applied to deductible non- participating.
